title: Different interpretations of Ibn Sirin seeing glasses in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing glasses in a dream. Many people use glasses for various reasons, including maintaining vision or protection from the sun, but we find that seeing them in a dream has several important connotations, so we will learn about the dream interpretation of glasses in a dream during the duration of this article. Interpretation of a dream about glasses in a dream. Picture this. Seeing some signs, such as: If the dreamer does not see it beautiful in his dream, this indicates a mistake he will make when making any decision in his life. When the dreamer sees someone carrying it with him, but it is brown, this indicates the need to pay attention when communicating with all relatives. Interpretation of a vision Glasses in a dream by Ibn Sirin Our venerable imam Ibn Sirin tells us about various meanings explained by this vision, such as: If the fortuneteller wears it and does not see through it, then this indicates the large number of hypocrites around him. Seeing this dream indicates the intelligence of this dreamer and his ability to move towards what is best and most appropriate. If the dreamer sees That it is colored in his dream, this indicates that there is something in his life that is pressuring him and making him sad. If a girl sees that she is wearing black, this indicates that she is doing her best. But if what she is wearing is of the medical type, this confirms that her partner is cheating on her and does not reciprocate. If a pregnant woman sees this vision, this is evidence of a very successful birth for her, but if she is lost in a dream, this indicates her desire for her husband to feel kindness and tenderness towards her. Interpretation of a dream about glasses by Ibn Shaheen Ibn Shaheen tells us several interpretations of this vision, which are as follows: Warning It is important for the fortuneteller to be careful of those who surround him with people who do not like and hate him. If it is red or pink, this indicates the personality of this dreamer who is optimistic about all things around him. If its color is green, this indicates that there are important wishes for the fortuneteller that will make him work hard until they come true. If the dreamer sees that his glasses are distorted through the glass, this confirms that there are wrong concepts that come to his mind. If they collapse, this indicates a complex crisis in his life. Seeing glasses in a dream for a single woman When he saw this dream, this was clear evidence: A constant feeling of shame when dealing With people, especially if she is black, it indicates her inability to speak well with everyone. Inability to be a special person in life. The dream shows that she is making some wrong choices that ruin her life a lot. Seeing the dream indicates the need for patience when making Any step in her life. Glasses in a dream for a married woman. This vision shows many signs, namely: weakness of her ability in many of the situations she goes through in her life. If she wears prescription glasses, this confirms the need to avoid mistrust of anyone, as she must abide by With some beautiful features so that her life goes well. Get a lot of money that greatly satisfies her desires. If it breaks down, this indicates a major disagreement with the partner. The dream may indicate the dreamer’s inability to provide services to people and this makes her appear bad in front of them. If she sees that she has a distinctive shape

title: What is the interpretation of a dream about someone you love crying according to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about someone you love crying in a dream is one of the visions that many of us often repeat, especially when the topic relates to the loss of a loved one, either due to absence, separation, or death, and it carries with it many different interpretations. Which we will mention in the article. The interpretation of a dream about crying for someone you love by Ibn Sirin. What is the interpretation of a dream about crying for someone you love? One of the interpretations of a dream about crying for someone you love is that it may be real through his subconscious mind and that he is really sad for him in reality, and this appeared in the dreamer’s dream in the form of crying A different and varied interpretation could be that the dreamer feels really happy with this person and this has been translated in the dream into crying. Loud screaming in a dream is different from silent crying. If he cries loudly, this means misfortunes and fears that may return to the dreamer in reality. As for crying silently and quietly, it is interpreted as joys and happy news in one’s life. An Egyptian website, the largest dream interpretation site in the Arab world. Just type the Egyptian dream interpretation website in Google and get the correct interpretations. Interpretation of a dream about crying for someone you love by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin interprets a dream about crying for someone You love him, especially if it is accompanied by screaming, slapping, and cutting pockets, as it indicates that the dreamer is suffering from problems and sadness in his life and will go through bad circumstances. In the event that you see someone crying in a dream without sound and tears, this is an indication of good news and happiness that will be present in the dreamer’s life. Among its interpretations is that crying over someone you do not know suggests that the dreamer may meet someone in his life who will help him solve his problems. The dreamer’s dream means that he is crying while reading the Qur’an with someone he loves, and that he is suffering from problems and sorrows, but they will disappear soon. Interpretation of a dream about someone you love crying For a single woman: The dream in which she cries for someone she loves indicates to the unmarried woman that she has been waiting to marry the person she wants and will get married soon. Seeing her crying over the death of her father in a dream means that she hopes that he will return to her life and that her mind rejects the reality of her father’s death. Dream An unmarried woman crying without a sound indicates that she is going through difficult psychological circumstances in her family and that these circumstances will end soon. If a girl is working in a job and sees herself crying for someone she does not know, this indicates that she will find someone who will help her move forward in life and work. Interpretation of a dream Crying for someone she loves, for a married woman: Seeing a married woman crying in a dream for someone she loves, and this person was her husband, for example, and she screamed loudly in the dream and was very sad, which means that she will enjoy great happiness and joy with her husband. If she dreams that she is crying a lot and her child is dead, this indicates A great livelihood is on her way. As for her dreaming that she is crying with tears and slapping, this means that she is suffering from many problems and crises. Married life. Seeing a married woman crying over someone she does not know means that she will meet someone who will help her through a wonderful experience that she may go through in her married life. Interpretation of a dream about someone she loves crying for a pregnant woman. A dream about a pregnant woman means a

title: I dreamed that I caught a free bird in a dream

preview.html: I dreamed that I caught a free bird in a dream. In the following lines, we will learn about my dream that I caught a free bird in a dream. All this and more details that interest you and whether it is good or bad. I dreamed that I caught a free bird in a dream. I dreamed that I caught a free bird in a dream. Catching a bird may mean that I benefit from his work, and God knows the unseen, as he can show the profit of his business, and God knows everything that is unseen. If a married woman sees herself catching a bird, this may lead to goodness, God willing. When she sees a married man carrying a bird, it may be evidence of good luck, God willing. I know the unseen. Interpretation of the dream of seeing bird’s milk in a dream. Interpretation of the dream of seeing bird’s milk in a dream. We did not find specific interpretations to see that. However, seeing bird’s milk could be a sign of lack of nutrition, and God knows the unseen. When the dreamer sees bird’s milk, this may indicate little money, and God knows best. The highest and most knowledgeable. If an unmarried young man sees camel milk, it may indicate her marriage to a righteous woman, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream of a bird turning into a child in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of a bird turning into a child in a dream could be an indication of the struggle for freedom, and God is Most High and Most Knowledgeable. When you see a bird turning To a child, this may indicate that he is thinking about change, and God knows the unseen. If a young man sees a bird turning into a child, this may indicate the search for freedom and security, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream of cutting a bird’s wing in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of cutting a bird’s wing in a dream could be a sign. To bad things, and God is Greatest and Most Knowing. In the case of seeing a pregnant woman cutting off a bird’s wing, this may indicate some difficulties, and God knows best. When a dreamer sees a bird’s wing being cut off, he may express his cruelty to his children, and God is Greatest and Most Knowing. Seeing a bird’s wings being cut off may also represent cruelty to children, And God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about a dead person raising birds in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a dead person raising birds in a dream. We did not find clear concepts for seeing this, except that seeing birds can lead to success in trade, and God knows the unseen. If a married woman sees birds, it may mean profit, and God knows best. When an unmarried girl sees birds, she can express kindness and happiness, God willing. Interpretation of a dream about a bird attacking me in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a bird attacking me in a dream. A dream could be a sign of exposure to trouble, and God knows the unseen. When I see a bird attacking me in a recurring dream, it may indicate haters, and God knows best. If a married man sees a bird attacking him, this may indicate a problem, and God knows the unseen. As for the dreamer, if he sees blood, it may indicate the invalidity of his dream, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about seeing The dead in the form of a bird in a dream. Interpretation of the dream of seeing the dead in the form of a bird in a dream. We did not find specific explanations for seeing this, except that seeing the dead may indicate the dead person’s need for supplication and charity, and God knows the unseen. Also, seeing the dead could indicate the dreamer’s failure in his rights, and God I know the unseen. When you see the dead, it indicates goodness and happiness, and God knows best

title: What is the interpretation of a dream about a white dove by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq?  The interpretation of a dream about a white dove in the house, and the interpretation of a dream about a white dove flying

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a white dove: The white dove actually carries signs of love and peace, and when the sleeper sees it, he rejoices gently and expects that it is a beautiful symbol for him in his interpretation. The white dove can be seen as a single, married, or pregnant woman, and the connotations associated with seeing it vary, and we explain the interpretation of the dream of the white dove in our topic. Interpretation of the dream of a white dove by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of the dream of the white dove? The white dove in a dream symbolizes the things that the dreamer prefers, dreams of, and calls for. May God Almighty grant it to him and many may come to him after seeing this dream. The white dove is a sign of stability in reality and an increase in love between the sleeper and his family or friends. It also indicates the end of bad deeds and anger. If you find a white dove in your workplace, it can be said that it is a worthy sign. Praiseworthy because it indicates great satisfaction for you in your finances and a happy event happening in the workplace that makes you very happy. If you find a white dove standing at the window of your room and you hear the sound of its clicking, this is a reminder of some things that you should have done, but forgot about in the previous days. Interpretation of a dream about a dove White by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin explains that a white dove in a dream is one of the gentle and friendly meanings in a person’s life, because it warns him of severe anxiety that gives him relief. It may be strange to see yourself turning into a beautiful white dove in your dream and this dream is interpreted through your noble and generous qualities and characteristics that It makes you a conciliatory person among people and far from harming them, which means that you always bring good deeds among everyone. One of the signs of seeing a lot of white doves is that a person wants to be in a good position and standing before God - Glory be to Him - in addition to being loved and trusted by people because of his morals. Al-Hamida.An Egyptian website, the largest website specialized in dream interpretation in the Arab world. All you have to do is write the Egyptian dream interpretation website on Google and get the correct interpretations.Interpretation of a dream about a white dove by Imam al-SadiqImam al-Sadiq explains that seeing a white dove has different meanings depending on where it appears to the dreamer. While the appearance of a white dove inside the house is a good thing in terms of family relationships, as it proves the love enjoyed by the people of the house, the strong trust between them and the absence of tension or fear in their home. The white dove can also be a sign of marriage for whoever desires it. If it is seen For a married woman, this dove is a reassuring message about the improvement of her financial situation and the abundance of affection she enjoys from her husband. As for watching a white dove being slaughtered in order to eat it, it is a bad sign in the world of dreams, as it indicates serious damage to a person’s life or that may befall a member of his family. . He must defend his family as much as possible, and God knows best. Through Google, you can be with us on the Egyptian Dream Interpretation Site and Ruaa, and you will find everything you are looking for. Interpretation of a dream about a white dove for a single woman. Legal interpreters say that a white dove in a girl’s dream indicates her marriage to a person who calls upon God Almighty.

title: Interpretation of a black car in a dream: seeing a black car

preview.html: Dreaming of a black car in the dream of a single, married, pregnant or divorced woman, whether she is driving the car, buying, selling, or meeting Ibn Sirin and others. The black car in a dream: The black car in a dream symbolizes the strong personality of men and is a symbol of power and influence and can indicate a high social status, especially if it The car is a luxury model or made of precious metals. It indicates wealth, dominance, prosperity, a journey, a journey, a major change in life, or a new experience in professional life such as marriage, work, or a trip, depending on the dreamer’s condition. If the car is black, it is better for those who love This color is for those who do not like this color or are not accustomed to it. Anyone who drives a black car with a friend indicates the stability of the financial relationship between them, and if it is white, it indicates marriage or engagement. Anyone who drives a black car could indicate a disaster for a relative, such as the death of a loved one. Extremely or a fortune teller himself. Interpretation of a dream about a black car by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin believes that a dream about buying a car or owning different means of transportation for camels and horsemen in general is an indication of the social status of its owner at that time, whether it is due to acquiring a new job that helps him. To increase his financial income, either due to the birth of males, or due to traveling to a foreign country abroad. While it indicates that the dream interpretation of the black car is an indication of the progress of this previously mentioned stage, this person will face major problems behind it, as some colleagues or Managers at work who want to tighten the screws on them. From.Interpretation of a black car in one dream. Also, the interpretation of this dream for a man could be an indication that he is exposed to some financial crises that cause him to accumulate debts and his inability to live a normal life as before.Interpretation of a black car in a dream for a married man, if this person is a boss. A family or a married man, this may mean that he is facing some problems with his wife and disagreements that prompt him to think about divorce. Interpretation of a black car in one dream With regard to the interpretation of a dream of a black car in a dream for an unmarried girl, this may indicate marriage to a wealthy man with an attractive appearance, but he He treats her inappropriately and causes her constant sadness. Interpretation of a black car in a dream for a married woman: If she is married and pregnant, this may mean that she will give birth to a male, but this will give her some problems in pregnancy or childbirth, but she will give birth to that child well. Interpretation of a black car in a dream for a pregnant woman’s vision A pregnant car in a dream means kindness, and seeing the car in all circumstances is good and enjoyable news that awaits you and the health of the new baby. Interpretation of a dream about a black car according to Al-Nabulsi. The interpretation of Sheikh Al-Nabulsi differs greatly from Ibn Sirin, as he sees the car as an indicator of the benevolence and goodness that its owner excelled at that time. Especially if the car is a happy color such as white, yellow or green. Interpretation of following a black car for a man and a woman if the car is black

The interpretation of Sheikh Al-Nabulsi differs greatly from Ibn Sirin, as he sees the car as an indicator of the benevolence and goodness that its owner excelled at that time. Especially if the car is a happy color such as white, yellow or green. Interpretation of following a black car for a man and a woman if the car is black

title: The 8 most famous interpretations of seeing almonds in a dream

preview.html: What is the interpretation of seeing almonds removed from the tree? A sign that you are taking money from a very stingy man. The interpretation of seeing eating almonds in a dream? It indicates a lot of money with the dreamer enjoying health and prosperity. What is the interpretation of seeing dry almonds? An indication of a lot Of talk and noise. What does it mean for a married woman to see green almonds? It is an indication that he can obtain money from people who are known for being stingy. What is the interpretation of seeing green almonds, but they are rotten and invalid? This is a sign that what you wish for will not come true. Seeing almonds in a dream Removing almonds from the tree It is a sign of taking money from a very stingy man. In general, almonds mean a person who is very stingy with others, but generous with his family. If you taste almonds in the dream and find their taste sweet, then you are a very secure person and feel good about being close to God. If you taste almonds And it was bitter, then you are telling the truth. Eating almonds a lot of money with the dreamer means health and well-being. Ibn Sirin interpreted tonsils as a young man who is a stranger to the household. Goose in a dream Seeing almonds in a dream means that a girl from the household will marry a strange man with whom she has no relation. Or he does not know it. Whoever sees that almond peels cover his body, this means that he is buying new clothes. Dry almonds are a sign of excessive talking and screaming. Dry almonds also mean sadness. If a person dreams that he is eating the leaves of an almond tree, this means a lot of money that he gets from A dominant man. Dreaming of green almonds for a married woman. Dreaming of eating green almonds for a married woman, then she will get money from people who are famous for stinginess. If she dreams of taking almonds out of her mouth, she will lose great and powerful opportunities in her life. Breaking a green almond is a sign that she is not watching her steps in life And you are facing a big problem. Jumping from the top of your tonsils means that you are escaping difficulties and disagreements with your husband. Seeing that you receive a gift of green almonds means that you will have good news and success. A dream about almonds for a pregnant woman Selling almonds means that your relationship with your husband will end, perhaps in divorce. Then seeing almonds In a dream, selling it in the market will make the husband lose his money or miss out on great opportunities. But if you dream that the almonds are fried, broken, and in bad condition, this is a sign of divorce. Then, when you see green almonds, but they are spoiled and good, this is a sign that what you wish for will not come true. Seeing Almonds for a single woman in a dream: A dream of eating green almonds in a dream for a single woman: The interpretation of seeing a married woman does not differ much from the interpretation of a single woman, except that the single woman saw that she was squeezing green almonds, because this indicates that she is connected to a new person and that this person makes her heart Happy and that his engagement will culminate in marriage. While she dreams of fried almonds, for a single woman, even if she is in a relationship or in a relationship with a young man, this relationship will fail and will not last long. Green almonds are an indicator of irrationality. Things that single women do in their lives, so they should consult their families and those who have strong opinions

title: Interpretation of seeing milk in a dream: Drinking milk in a dream

preview.html: The meaning of milk, whether hot or cold, is spoiled for unmarried women without drinking it. Giving spilled curd to a married woman to a pregnant woman. Interpretation of milk in a dream. Milk in a dream indicates the validity of the Islamic nature and the validity of the Messenger’s faith, in reference to what was reported on the authority of the Prophet, may God bless him and grant him peace, when he said: “Whoever sees that He drinks milk. Instinct “that is, proof of the validity and soundness of innate nature. Milk is money in reality. Whoever sees in his dream that he is drawing milk from the breast, whether the dreamer is a man or a woman, his vision shows a lot of money and livelihood that he acquires and earns in reality. As for drinking milk, meanings have appeared This vision is different. For someone who dreams that he is drinking milk in a dream, his vision indicates sustenance with money and obtaining large sums of halal money, which is undoubtedly the case. Whoever sees in his dream that he is drinking mare’s milk, his vision shows good relations. Which the dreamer enters into with one of the rulers and officials in reality, as the dreamer benefits from this strong relationship full of love and giving. sincerity. By obtaining a sum from that official or ruler who drank milk in his dream, and the milk that the fortuneteller drank was camel milk, then the dream is marriage and marrying a righteous woman who will enter into happiness and pleasure in the embrace of her husband, and this happens if the dreamer. He is alone. If the dreamer is married and dreams that he is drinking camel’s milk, then his vision indicates feeding a beneficial male child who will be known for his goodness when he grows up. A dream about a camel milking with the intention of drawing milk from its breast indicates many different meanings. The merchant who sees in his dream that he is milking a camel and milking from her breast, so it appears His vision of profit, money and wealth that he acquires in his reality. If a person dreams that he is milking a camel, but blood comes out instead of milk, then the dream indicates the injustice to which this dreamer is exposed by one of the rulers or officials of his country. If this is the milk that came out of the camel’s chest Poisoned, the dream indicates the suspicious and deprived money that the dreamer obtains in reality. Cow’s milk is permissible money, wealth, blessing, and an increase in debt. Whoever sees in his dream that he is drinking cow’s milk or milking a cow, then his vision indicates wealth if the dreamer is poor. If the dreamer is A slave, then seeing him shows his liberation and liberation from that slavery, but if the dreamer is milking a sheep or a sheep and a goat in the dream, then this dream is an indication that money will come to the dreamer. In fact, lion's milk brings victory and honor to the monarch. If the dreamer drinks it, it gives victory and victory over his enemy, or the dreamer takes some money from the unjust ruler who fears the people. Dog or fox milk in a dream is not good in reality, because it indicates fear, anxiety, insecurity, and insecurity in the dreamer’s life. It is said that pig’s milk indicates Transformation and change in the mental principles and concepts of the dreamer if he drinks it in a dream. It has been said in some cases that pig’s milk indicates money in two ways: If there is a lot of pig’s milk, then it is forbidden money. As for tiger coffee, it indicates...

title: Interpretation of a dream about buying a gold earring in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about buying a gold earring in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about buying a gold earring in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about buying a gold earring in a dream can be evidence of a friend helping the dreamer, and God knows the unseen. If a married man sees himself buying a gold earring for his wife, he can express his love for his wife, and God knows best. Likewise, if the dreamer sees a gold earring, it may be a sign of sustenance for the dreamer, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about buying ice cream in a dream. Interpretation of dreams that I buy ice cream in a dream can be a sign of promotion, and God knows best. If the dreamer sees himself buying ice cream, it may indicate success in life, and God knows best. If a married man sees himself buying ice cream in a dream, it may indicate good luck, and God knows best. When you see an ice cream market, it can indicate goodness and happiness, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about buying toys in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about buying toys in a dream can lead to goodness, and God knows best. Where if a single girl is seen buying toys, it may lead to an official relationship and intercourse, and God knows best. If a married woman sees children's toys, it may lead to the satisfaction of desires, and God is Most High and Most Knowledgeable. If the dreamer sees toys Children, it may be evidence of achieving goals, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream that I buy accessories in a dream. Interpretation of a dream that I buy accessories in a dream can lead to goodness, God willing. When a single girl sees buying accessories, it expresses goodness and prosperity, God knows best. If the dreamer sees himself buying fake accessories in a dream, it may lead to deceiving someone, and God knows best. If the dreamer sees himself buying a white cloth in a dream, it may indicate goodness and livelihood, and God knows best. When you see buying silk fabric, it can lead to goodness and happiness, and God knows best. Also, seeing an unmarried girl buying a silk cloth may be a reward from God, and God knows best. When the dreamer sees himself buying a piece of land, it may be successful deals, and God knows best. If a married woman sees herself buying a piece of land, it may be a sign of deals And successful transactions, and God knows the unseen. When you see a single girl buying a piece of land, perhaps this indicates material gains, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about buying a goat in a dream. If the dreamer sees himself buying a goat, it may be a sign of kindness, and God knows the unseen. If a married woman sees herself buying a goat in a dream, it may represent goodness and benefit, and God knows the unseen.

title: Interpretation of a dream about carrots by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: Everything you need to know about the interpretation of a dream about carrots in a dream: Carrots are considered an orange-colored vegetable, which we find acceptable and desirable for many people, because carrots are easily shaped and can be put in different foods or squeezed and turned into a drink, and seeing them may have implications for that. It may differ somewhat due to the nature of the dreamer, his personal life, and the facts it contains. It may appear in the dream in a completely different color, and the dreamer may see that he is cutting it or peeling it, and then sees the root indicating many ideas, and this will become clear in the following article. Interpretation of a dream about carrots in a dream. Carrots in a dream are difficult and easy at the same time, which means that the dreamer will face many difficulties or critical situations, but thanks to his wisdom and certain external circumstances, it will be easy for him to overcome these adversities. It symbolizes great events, high ambitions and the ways in which there are many Of obstacles and many ambiguities in the dreamer’s life, and all of these, once overcome, the dreamer will find himself on a date with the desired and desired goal. The islands in the vision may indicate a person whom the dreamer should pay attention to, if he feels that he is flirting with him in a way that raises suspicions. This person may be one of the hypocrites who paint in seductive colors to establish their plots without anyone feeling it. Seeing carrots shows the sadness that afflicts the human heart, the problems that prevent him from reaching his goal, and the constant feeling that the future will not be bright. Seeing him also symbolizes effort The great effort that the dreamer makes to overcome all the obstacles placed in his path to prevent him from achieving his goal. Carrots also indicate abundance of money, spiritual and practical growth, growth and a true desire to break the impossible. A large number of commentators unanimously agreed to interpret the vision of carrots as symbolizing temptation and attractive things that dazzle. The viewer, and his fascination with her may be evil and scheming, so he must be careful in every step he takes. It also indicates transparency and a tendency to avoid ambiguity, and this clarity can expose him to many judgments with others, because he tells the truth as it is, so he does not fear the responsibility of being accused. In fact.His vision symbolizes extraordinary changes that will not happen without the hand of the visionary, as all the difficulties and problems he experiences will remain the same unless he himself changes or tries to change the current situation. According to the popular interpretation, there is an opinion that carrots symbolize good eyesight. And insight. Interpretation of a dream about carrots in a dream by Miller. We find in Miller’s Encyclopedia more than one interpretation of seeing carrots and they can be summarized as follows: For Miller, seeing carrots symbolizes good health and a state of mind, or that the body really needs them. He also distinguishes the colors of carrots and mentions white carrots in particular. Specifically, he believes that the parsnip symbolizes achieving the highest percentages, whether at work or study, and achieving a state of psychological satisfaction. If the parsnip indicates practical success, on the other hand, it indicates emotional failure and difficulty in completing tasks.

title: What is the interpretation of Ibn Sirin’s dream of killing cockroaches?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about killing cockroaches: Seeing a cockroach in reality is one of the things that causes anxiety and panic in humans and makes them feel disgusted, but many people see in their dreams that they are killing cockroaches. If The dreamer was a single young man and faced some problems and crises in his work, so this dream foretells to him that he will get rid of it and find a new job in which he feels stable and comfortable. If the dreamer kills cockroaches in a dream with gunfire, this indicates positive changes that will occur in his life and he will change it for the better or that he will obtain A gift from someone close to him will make him feel happy and change his psychological state. To get the most accurate interpretation of your dream, search on Google, the Egyptian Dream Interpretation website, which includes thousands of interpretations by major interpretive scholars. Interpretation of a dream about killing cockroaches by Ibn Sirin. The scholar Ibn Sirin explained that seeing cockroaches in a dream is generally an indication that The dreamer is surrounded by a large number of enemies and people who are trying to destroy his life. If the dreamer sees cockroaches trying to attack him, this is a sign that he will face a large number of crises in the coming days. Ibn Sirin explained that seeing killing cockroaches and getting rid of them is a vision that carries good interpretations. When he tries A person kills a cockroach in a dream, but fails. This indicates that he is seeking to get rid of what is bothering him and disrupting his days. Interpretation of a dream about killing cockroaches for unmarried women. If an unmarried woman sees a cockroach in her dream in one of the corners of her room, in the kitchen, or on her bed, this means that she will face many obstacles and problems. Which prevents the fulfillment of her dreams, and if this girl is engaged, the dream indicates that she will end her engagement. Seeing very large and black cockroaches indicates the difficult events that he will experience in the coming days, and that he will pass a wonderful test. If she sees herself trying to kill cockroaches in a dream, this indicates However, she is trying to get rid of the existing differences between her and her fiancé, or she is trying to eliminate her enemies who want to harm her. When she dreams of getting rid of a brown cockroach and killing it, this indicates that she will end a relationship she had with a young man with bad morals and who has no feelings towards her. Interpretation of a dream about killing cockroaches for a married woman: Cockroaches In a married woman’s dream, it is an indication of many skirmishes that occur between her and her husband or between her and the husband’s family, which worsen and lead to divorce. If she sees in her dream the presence of cockroaches in her bed, this indicates the disasters that will happen to her in her life and she should be careful. When she sees Cockroaches come out of the drain and she was able to catch them and kill them. This is an indication that she is surrounded by many women who want to spoil her life, but she will get rid of them, and
